sentences.en: A good relationship involves concern and sensitivity for each other's feelings.
sentences.cn: 一段美满的恋情需要彼此关心并体恤对方的情感。

sentences.en: After sixteen years of marriage they have grown bored with each other.
sentences.cn: 结婚16年后，他们已经渐渐彼此厌倦了。

sentences.en: During each show we will be raffling a fabulous prize.
sentences.cn: 每场表演期间，我们将以抽彩方法送出大奖。

sentences.en: Each answer is worth 20 points.
sentences.cn: 每题为20分。

sentences.en: Each brick also varies slightly in tone, texture and size.
sentences.cn: 每块砖在色调、质地与大小上也都略有不同。

sentences.en: Each dress is hemmed and scrupulously checked for imperfections.
sentences.cn: 每条连衣裙都缝上了褶边，并经过严格的检查，不允许有任何瑕疵。

sentences.en: Each family farms individually and reaps the benefit of its labor.
sentences.cn: 各家经营各自的农场，收获各自的劳动成果。

sentences.en: Each member of the team is given a particular job to do.
sentences.cn: 队里的每个成员都有特定的工作要做。

sentences.en: Each month the total prize kitty is £13.5 million.
sentences.cn: 每个月的彩池奖金总额达1,350万英镑。

sentences.en: Family therapy showed us how to communicate with each other.
sentences.cn: 家庭疗法指导我们彼此之间的沟通交流。

sentences.en: Grill the fish for five minutes on each side.
sentences.cn: 把鱼的两面各烤上五分钟。

sentences.en: His voice was harsh as he enunciated each word carefully.
sentences.cn: 他一字一顿，听上去很生硬。

sentences.en: Large overseas-based trusts are an excellent each way bet.
sentences.cn: 大型海外基金的投资前景非常好。

sentences.en: Nobel for each and every one of us.
sentences.cn: 一个我们每一个人的诺贝尔和平奖。

sentences.en: Online gaming allows players from around the world to challenge each other.
sentences.cn: 网络游戏使得全球的玩家可以相互较量。

sentences.en: She had a bottle in each hand.
sentences.cn: 她两只手上各拿着一个瓶子。

sentences.en: She planted a kiss on each of his leathery cheeks.
sentences.cn: 她在他粗糙的面颊上左右各吻了一下。

sentences.en: Shopkeepers buy them in bulk and resell them for £150 each.
sentences.cn: 店主们先大量购进，然后再以150英镑的单价将它们转卖出去。

sentences.en: taking each and every opportunity.
sentences.cn: 抓住每一个机会。

sentences.en: The children were given one each, handed to them or placed on their plates.
sentences.cn: 孩子们每人给一个，递给他们或者放在他们的盘子里。

sentences.en: The tickets cost £20 each (= each ticket costs £20 ).
sentences.cn: 票价为20英镑一张。

sentences.en: The winner of each preliminary goes through to the final.
sentences.cn: 每场初赛的获胜者进入决赛。

sentences.en: Then, everyone competed in each event, one by one.
sentences.cn: 接着，人人一个接一个地在每项活动中比赛。

sentences.en: There are 250 blocks of stone, and each one weighs a ton.
sentences.cn: 有250块大石头，每块重一吨。

sentences.en: There are four bedrooms, each with its own shower and WC.
sentences.cn: 有四间卧室，每间都有独立的淋浴器和抽水马桶。

sentences.en: They reviewed each aspect of the plan bit by bit.
sentences.cn: 他们对计划的各个方面逐一地进行了审核。

sentences.en: Try to dress appropriately for each occasion.
sentences.cn: 试图为每个场合适当地打扮。

sentences.en: Try to support each other when one of you is feeling down.
sentences.cn: 当有人觉得情绪低落时，要努力相互打气。

sentences.en: We each have our own skills.
sentences.cn: 我们每个人都有自己的技能。

sentences.en: When the children arrive, you give them each a balloon.
sentences.cn: 孩子们到后，你给他们每人发一个气球。

sentences.en: You get two cookies each (= every one of you gets two cookies ).
sentences.cn: 你们每人可以拿两块甜饼干。

phrases.tran_cn: 全部，个个；全体，人人，大家都，统统；没有例外
人人，各人，每人，个个，各个

trans.tran_cn: 每人， 每个， 每件

trans.tran_en: used to refer to every one of two or more people or things, when you are thinking about them separately
every one of two or more things or people, considered separately
every one of two or more things or people, considered separately
